virtual bool iview::CViewBase::CanBeMoved ( ) const [protected, virtual]

This method is internal used to check, if drag mode is allowed.

Normally it return IsViewDraggable(), but in derived class you can change its implementation to avoid dragging.

Definition at line 413 of file CViewBase.h.

const i2d::CAffine2d & iview::CViewBase::GetLogToViewTransform ( ) const [inline, virtual]

Get logical units to view transformation.

This transformation converts logical units to view coordinate system. Please note, that it is only affine transformation, not a calibration. You can use it as a calibration only, when linear transformation is enough. To get transformation to convert logical units to screen pixel, use GetLogToScreenTransform().

Implements iview::ILogicalCoords.

Definition at line 407 of file CViewBase.h.

IInteractiveShape * iview::CViewBase::GetMouseShapePtr ( ) const [inline]

Returns:
shape under mouse pointer, or NULL if there is no shape.
